value.title: Making robots useful in the warehouse

value.title: Neural’s guide to the glorious future of AI: Here’s how machines become sentient
value.excerpt: Welcome to Neural’s guide guide to the glorious future of AI. What wonders will tomorrow’s machines be capable of? How do we get from Alexa and Siri to Rosie the Robot and R2D2? In this speculative science series we’ll put our optimist hats on and try to answer those questions and more.

value.title: Austria wants ethical rules on battlefield killer robots – Jaweb
value.excerpt: Vienna is embarking on a diplomatic initiative to draw up an ethical framework for the use of killer robots on the battlefields of the future. Foreign Minister Alexander Schallenberg said similar standards should be adopted as those established for landmines and cluster weapons.
